715923f-a.folder: Allen Street & Broome Street, Manhattan, NY
715923f-a.text:
Allen Street, north from Broome Street, showing prominently the clearance on the easterly side of same. A northbound thoroughfare is to be constructed here, separated from its parallel lane by a narrow park.  Delancey Street is in the center. Note upon same the newly built comfort station. Beyond appears the Rivington Street and the Chanin and Chrysler building.

October 31, 1931
Vies? 1,2

F.R Sperr

715924f-a.folder: Allen Street & Broome Street, Manhattan, NY
715924f-a.text:
Allen Street, north from Broome Street, showing demolition on the easterly side, preparatory to the widening of this thoroughfare. Delancey Street is in the center and the photographer is viewing towards same.
September 30, 1931
Views 1,2
P. L. Sperr

715926f-a.folder: Allen Street & Broome Street, Manhattan, NY
715926f-a.text:
96-92 Allen Street, east side, between Broome and Delancey Streets.
June 21, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

717860f-a.folder: Broome Street & Allen Street, Manhattan, NY
717860f-a.text:
Broome Street, south side, east from Allen Street.
June 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.
